attributes.action: cut cost on court fees fighting for us fathers to see are children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: at the moment i am looking for help fighting for access to see my 4 year old child who i havent seen in 2 years. the cost for solicitors and court fees are very expensive.i am a working person i am not getting any help from the state.If i afford to fight for access for my child i wouldnt be able to live and support myself.
